vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time before the Flood, only mentioned at Gen.4.20;
son of: Lamech (H3929) and Adah (H5711);
brother of: Jubal (H3106), Tubal-cain (H8423), Naamah (H5279)
§ Jabal = "stream of water"
the son of Lamech by Adah and brother of Jubal; described as the father of such as dwell in tents and have cattle
vocabInfos._es_Definition: (1)   zanja de agua; (2)   hijo de Lámec; descendiente de Caín
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
雅八 这个陽性專有名詞在原文的意思是 "水流"
拉麥和亞大的兒子, 猶八的兄弟; 被稱為住帳棚、牧養牲畜之人的祖師 (創4:20)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
雅八 这个阳性专有名词在原文的意思是 "水流"
拉麦和亚大的儿子, 犹八的兄弟; 被称为住帐棚、牧养牲畜之人的祖师 (创4:20)
